name: HealthyHomeWeekly
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to weekly updates from your favorite healthy home source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime. 

Blooming! A Healthy Home by Design is a podcast that is all about helping you make the world a healthier place for your family.... one home at a time. As a parent, we all want to keep our families safe and provide a healthy environment for our kids to thrive. Each week, we’ll tackle the common misconception that the only factors for good health are what’s on your plate and how much you go to the gym. It’s so more than diet and exercise, it’s includes your physical surroundings, mindset, relationships, personal growth and more. And how does our home fit into this? On Blooming! A Healthy Home by Design, we’ll uncover the many ways you can expand your overall wellbeing at home and ensure that even your physical environment supports you and your family so you can bloom and grow. 

Disclaimer: This skill is for informational and educational purposes only and is more of a general guideline to overall wellbeing. It is in no way meant to replace seeing a physician for the health and wellness specific to you and your family.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
